name: flow-typer-js
description: Declarative static and runtime type checking with Flow
author: Gregor Mazovec <gregor.mazovec@gmail.com>

scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run dist:flow && npm run dist:remove-types
scripts.dist:flow: cp -Rv src dist && find dist -type f -name '*.js' -exec mv -v {} {}.flow \;
scripts.test: npm run dist && npm run test:remove-types && npm run test:unit && npm run test:type
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:type && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:remove-types: flow-remove-types --out-dir dist-test test && find dist-test -type f -name '*.js' -exec sed -i '' 's/..\/src/..\/dist/' {} \;
